setAllowance(address,address,uint96,uint.details: Allows to update the allowance for a specified token. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.delegate: Delegate whose allowance should be updated.
params.resetBaseMin: Time based on which the reset time should be increased
params.resetTimeMin: Time after which the allowance should reset
